title: Cant patch 7.11 (PLEASE HELP)
body: I was able to update the client itself to the new patch, but I cant seem to install the new patch. This means I can't play nor spectate anyone's game. A problem may be my internet connection, but I don't think that's it, since it's been going on fro 2 days, and I haven't had problems patching anything else before. I tried literally everything: Restarting computer, restarting the client, and even reinstalling the game. Nothing seems to work. I'm getting really frustrated at this point. The play button freezes at zero percent and doesn't move from there. When you hover over it it just says scanning: Files scanned: 1 or 2 and releasemanifest. Please help. I'm getting tired of writing walls of text.

replies.body: I think we can get that patch working again pretty easily if you're getting stuck below 30% on the patcher. At the beginning of the patch, the client needs to scan the game files for changes. If the client is denied access to those files, it will get stuck and then eventually error out. Let's quickly update some of your [**permissions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) to see if that does the trick!

Let's quickly update some of your [**permissions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) to see if that does the trick!

I did all of that, but it reached 99 percent when downloading and went back to saying zero percent. I have no idea whats wrong.
